Html:
Hi guys,

is it possible to create PDF/A 1-a documents with FO.net? Some example-code would be great!

Thx in advance.

 

JasonX

Hi Jason

I am not really up to speed with what a PDF/A 1-a document is - however I am fairly certain that FO.NET does not support them.  Can you provide more details regarding this format and what you are wanting to achieve?

Cheers

Mark

Hi Mark,

thanks for your reply. PDF/A 1-a is a PDF-standard regarding to an ISO-standard. I can give you only the information I found on the Internet:

http://www.pdfa.org/doku.php?id=pdfa:en

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PDF/A

CU

JasonX

Hi Jason

I have had a quick read about this and can now confirm that FO.NET cannot be used to create PDF/A 1-a documents.

Since PDF/A 1-a is a subset of PDF 1.4, then it is technically feasible and may not be too big a job.  If you try to tackle this yourself and need any pointers then let me know.

Cheers
Mark
